Source code for straph.betweenness

import sys, math, queue,time

from collections import defaultdict
# GRAPH FUNCTIONS


[docs]def graph_dist(N, v):
    d = {}
    d[v] = 0
    if v not in N:
        return d
    q = queue.Queue()
    q.put(v)
    while not q.empty():
        v = q.get()
        assert v in N
        for u in N[v]:
            if u not in d:
                q.put(u)
                d[u] = d[v] + 1
    return d




[docs]def graph_is_reachable(N, w, v):
    if w == v:
        return True
    if w not in N or v not in N:
        return False
    marked = set()
    q = queue.Queue()
    q.put(v)
    marked.add(v)
    while not q.empty():
        v = q.get()
        assert v in N
        for u in N[v]:
            if u not in marked:
                if u == w:
                    return True
                q.put(u)
                marked.add(u)
    return False




[docs]def graph_non_trivial_connected_components(N):
    result = []
    marked = set()
    for v in N:
        if v not in marked:
            component = set()
            component.add(v)
            q = queue.Queue()
            q.put(v)
            marked.add(v)
            while not q.empty():
                v = q.get()
                assert v in N
                for u in N[v]:
                    if u not in marked:
                        component.add(u)
                        q.put(u)
                        marked.add(u)
            result.append(component)
    return result




[docs]def graph_dist_sigma(N, v):
    d = {}
    s = {}
    d[v] = 0
    s[v] = 1
    if v not in N:
        return (d, s)
    q = queue.Queue()
    q.put(v)
    while not q.empty():
        v = q.get()
        assert v in N
        for u in N[v]:
            if u not in d:
                q.put(u)
                d[u] = d[v] + 1
                s[u] = 0
            if d[u] == d[v] + 1:
                s[u] += s[v]
    return (d, s)




[docs]def is_sorted(l):
    for i in range(len(l) - 1):
        if l[i] > l[i + 1]:
            return False
    return True



# functions to get neighborhoods

all_N = {}
nb_all_N = 0



[docs]def get_graph_neighborhood(t):
    global nb_all_N
    if t in all_N:
        nb_all_N += 1
        return all_N[t]
    N = defaultdict(set)
    for (b, e, u, v) in E:
        if b <= t <= e:
            N[u].add(v)
            N[v].add(u)
    for v in N:
        N[v] = list(N[v])
    if Caching:
        all_N[t] = N
    return N



all_N_minus = {}
nb_all_N_minus = 0



[docs]def get_graph_neighborhood_minus(t):
    global nb_all_N_minus
    if t in all_N_minus:
        nb_all_N_minus += 1
        return all_N_minus[t]
    N = defaultdict(set)
    for (b, e, u, v) in E:
        if b < t and e >= t:
            N[u].add(v)
            N[v].add(u)
    for v in N:
        N[v] = list(N[v])
    if Caching:
        all_N_minus[t] = N
    return N



# distance and dimension functions

# priority queue functions

[docs]def empty_priority():
    return set()




[docs]def is_empty_priority(s):
    return len(s) == 0




[docs]def push_priority(s, x):
    s.add(x)




[docs]def pop_priority(s):
    assert not is_empty_priority(s)
    (r_v, r_dist, r_dim) = (None, None, None)
    for (v, dist, dim) in s:
        if r_dist == None or dist < r_dist:
            (r_v, r_dist, r_dim) = (v, dist, dim)
        elif dist == r_dist:
            if dim > r_dim:
                (r_v, r_dist, r_dim) = (v, dist, dim)
    s.remove((r_v, r_dist, r_dim))
    return (r_v, r_dist, r_dim)




[docs]def pop_priority_dist(s):
    assert not is_empty_priority(s)
    (r_v, r_dist) = (None, None)
    for (v, dist) in s:
        if r_dist == None or dist < r_dist:
            (r_v, r_dist) = (v, dist)
    s.remove((r_v, r_dist))
    return (r_v, r_dist)



all_DD = {}
nb_all_DD = 0



[docs]def dist_and_dim(tup, j):
    (i, s) = tup
    global nb_all_DD
    if ((i, s), j) in all_DD:
        nb_all_DD += 1
        return all_DD[((i, s), j)]
    R = set([s])
    (Dist, Dim) = ({}, {})
    N = get_graph_neighborhood(i)
    d = graph_dist(N, s)
    for v in d:
        (Dist[(i, v)], Dim[(i, v)]) = (d[v], 0)
        R.add(v)
    if i == j:
        if Caching:
            all_DD[((i, s), j)] = (Dist, Dim)
        return (Dist, Dim)
    t_list = [i] + [t for t in eventtimes if i < t and t < j] + [j]
    assert is_sorted(t_list)
    t_index = 0
    for t_index in range(len(t_list) - 1):
        t = t_list[t_index]
        t_plus = t_list[t_index + 1]
        assert (t >= i)
        assert (t_plus <= j)
        assert (t_plus > t)

        N = get_graph_neighborhood_minus(t_plus)
        marked = set()
        Q = empty_priority()
        for w in R:
            push_priority(Q, (w, Dist[(t, w)], Dim[(t, w)]))
        while not is_empty_priority(Q):
            (v, dist, dim) = pop_priority(Q)
            if v not in marked:
                R.add(v)
                (Dist[(t_plus, v)], Dim[(t_plus, v)]) = (dist, dim)
                if v in N:
                    for u in N[v]:
                        if u not in marked:
                            push_priority(Q, (u, dist + 1, dim + 1))
                marked.add(v)

        N = get_graph_neighborhood(t_plus)
        marked = set()
        Q = empty_priority()
        for w in R:
            push_priority(Q, (w, Dist[(t_plus, w)], Dim[(t_plus, w)]))
        while not is_empty_priority(Q):
            (v, dist, dim) = pop_priority(Q)
            if v not in marked:
                R.add(v)
                (Dist[(t_plus, v)], Dim[(t_plus, v)]) = (dist, dim)
                if v in N:
                    for u in N[v]:
                        if u not in marked:
                            push_priority(Q, (u, dist + 1, dim))
                marked.add(v)
    if Caching:
        all_DD[((i, s), j)] = (Dist, Dim)
    return (Dist, Dim)




[docs]def only_dist(tup, j):
    chrono = time.time()

    (i, s) = tup
    global nb_all_DD
    if ((i, s), j) in all_DD:
        nb_all_DD += 1
        return all_DD[((i, s), j)]
    R = set([s])
    Dist = {}
    N = get_graph_neighborhood(i)
    d = graph_dist(N, s)
    for v in d:
        Dist[(i, v)] = d[v]
        R.add(v)
    if i == j:
        if Caching:
            all_DD[((i, s), j)] = Dist
        return Dist
    t_list = [i] + [t for t in eventtimes if i < t and t < j] + [j]
    assert is_sorted(t_list)
    t_index = 0
    for t_index in range(len(t_list) - 1):

        t = t_list[t_index]
        t_plus = t_list[t_index + 1]
        assert (t >= i)
        assert (t_plus <= j)
        assert (t_plus > t)

        N = get_graph_neighborhood_minus(t_plus)
        marked = set()
        Q = empty_priority()
        for w in R:
            push_priority(Q, (w, Dist[(t, w)]))
        while not is_empty_priority(Q):
            (v, dist) = pop_priority_dist(Q)
            if v not in marked:
                R.add(v)
                (Dist[(t_plus, v)]) = dist
                if v in N:
                    for u in N[v]:
                        if u not in marked:
                            push_priority(Q, (u, dist + 1))
                marked.add(v)
        N = get_graph_neighborhood(t_plus)
        marked = set()
        Q = empty_priority()
        for w in R:
            push_priority(Q, (w, Dist[(t_plus, w)]))
        while not is_empty_priority(Q):
            (v, dist) = pop_priority_dist(Q)
            if v not in marked:
                R.add(v)
                (Dist[(t_plus, v)]) = dist
                if v in N:
                    for u in N[v]:
                        if u not in marked:
                            push_priority(Q, (u, dist + 1))
                marked.add(v)
    if Caching:
        all_DD[((i, s), j)] = (Dist)
    return (Dist)


# VSP functions

# volume operations

[docs]def plusvol(e1, e2):
    (q_, d_) = e2
    (q, d) = e1
    if d == d_:
        return (q + q_, d)
    elif d > d_:
        return (q, d)
    return (q_, d_)




[docs]def minusvol(v, e):
    (q, d) = e
    return (plusvol(v, (-q, d)))




[docs]def divvol(e1, e2):
    (q, d) = e1
    (q_, d_) = e2
    if d == d_:
        return float(q) / float(q_)
    assert d < d_
    return 0.




[docs]def timesvol(e1, e2):
    (q, d) = e1
    (q_, d_) = e2
    return (q * q_, d + d_)




[docs]def VSP_aux_singleton(dist, dim, t, amount):
    x_list = []
    for x in V:
        if (t, x) in dist:
            x_list.append((dist[(t, x)], x))
    x_list.sort()
    N = get_graph_neighborhood(t)
    for (d_x, x) in x_list:
        assert d_x == dist[(t, x)]
        if x in N:
            for y in N[x]:
                if (dist[(t, y)], dim[(t, y)]) == (dist[(t, x)] + 1, dim[(t, x)]):
                    if (t, y) not in amount:
                        amount[(t, y)] = 0.
                    amount[(t, y)] += amount[(t, x)]




[docs]def VSP_aux_interval(dist, dim, t, t_plus, amount):
    N = get_graph_neighborhood_minus(t_plus)
    for x in V:
        (dist_x, sigma_x) = graph_dist_sigma(N, x)
        assert x in dist_x
        for y in dist_x:
            d = dist_x[y]
            if x == y:
                assert d == 0
            if (t_plus, y) in dist and (t, x) in dist:
                if (dist[(t_plus, y)], dim[(t_plus, y)]) == (dist[(t, x)] + d, dim[(t, x)] + d):
                    if (t_plus, y) not in amount:
                        amount[(t_plus, y)] = 0.
                    amount[(t_plus, y)] += amount[(t, x)] * sigma_x[y] * (t_plus - t) ** d / math.factorial(d)



all_VSP = {}
nb_all_VSP = 0



[docs]def VSP(e1, e2):
    (i, u), (j, w) = e1, e2
    global nb_all_VSP
    if ((i, u), (j, w)) in all_VSP:
        nb_all_VSP += 1
        return all_VSP[((i, u), (j, w))]
    (dist, dim) = dist_and_dim((i, u), j)
    amount = {}
    amount[(i, u)] = 1.
    VSP_aux_singleton(dist, dim, i, amount)
    if i == j:
        if Caching:
            all_VSP[((i, u), (j, w))] = (amount[(j, w)], 0)
        return (amount[(j, w)], 0)
    t_list = [i] + [t for t in eventtimes if i < t and t < j] + [j]
    assert is_sorted(t_list)
    for t_index in range(len(t_list) - 1):
        t = t_list[t_index]
        t_plus = t_list[t_index + 1]
        assert (t_plus <= j)
        assert (t >= i)
        assert (t_plus > t)
        VSP_aux_interval(dist, dim, t, t_plus, amount)
        VSP_aux_singleton(dist, dim, t_plus, amount)
    if (j, w) in amount:
        if Caching:
            all_VSP[((i, u), (j, w))] = (amount[(j, w)], dim[(j, w)])
        return (amount[(j, w)], dim[(j, w)])
    if Caching:
        all_VSP[((i, u), (j, w))] = (0., 0.)
    return (0., 0.)



all_VSP_tv = {}
nb_all_VSP_tv = 0



[docs]def VSP_tv(e1, e2, e3):
    (i, u), (j, w), (t, v) = e1, e2, e3
    global nb_all_VSP_tv
    if ((i, u), (j, w), (t, v)) in all_VSP_tv:
        nb_all_VSP_tv += 1
        return all_VSP_tv[((i, u), (j, w), (t, v))]
    (dist_iu, _) = dist_and_dim((i, u), j)
    (dist_tv, _) = dist_and_dim((t, v), j)
    # three lines hack to get dist_iu[(t,v)]
    (dist_iut, _) = dist_and_dim((i, u), t)
    if (t, v) in dist_iut:
        dist_iu[(t, v)] = dist_iut[(t, v)]
    if (t, v) in dist_iu and (j, w) in dist_iu and (j, w) in dist_tv:
        if dist_iu[(j, w)] == dist_iu[(t, v)] + dist_tv[(j, w)]:
            resu = timesvol(VSP((i, u), (t, v)), VSP((t, v), (j, w)))
            if Caching:
                all_VSP_tv[((i, u), (j, w), (t, v))] = resu
            return resu
    # return timesvol(VSP((i,u),(t,v)),VSP((t,v),(j,w)))
    if Caching:
        all_VSP_tv[((i, u), (j, w), (t, v))] = (0., 0.)
    return (0., 0.)




[docs]def Propagate(N, t, P):
    components = graph_non_trivial_connected_components(N)
    for C in components:
        b_prime = -math.inf
        X = set()
        for v in C:
            if v in P and len(P[v]) > 0:
                (b_second, e_second, l_second) = P[v][-1]
                if b_second > b_prime:
                    b_prime = b_second
                    X = set([v])
                elif b_second == b_prime:
                    X.add(v)
        if len(X) != 0:
            for v in C:
                if v not in X:
                    P[v].append((b_prime, t, t - b_prime))


all_LL = {}
nb_all_LL = 0



[docs]def Latency_lists(u):
    chrono = time.time()
    global nb_all_LL
    if u in all_LL:
        nb_all_LL += 1
        return all_LL[u]
    P = defaultdict(list)
    LL = {}
    # for v in V:
    #     P[v] = []
    for t in eventtimes:
        P[u].append((t, t, 0))
        N = get_graph_neighborhood(t)
        Propagate(N, t, P)
    LL[u] = [(alpha, omega, 0)]

    for v in V - {u}:
        LL[v] = []
        (b_prime, e_prime) = (None, None)
        for (b, e, l) in P[v]:
            if l != 0:
                if b_prime != None:
                    LL[v].append((b_prime, e_prime, 0))
                    (b_prime, e_prime) = (None, None)
                LL[v].append((b, e, l))
            else:
                if b_prime == None:
                    (b_prime, e_prime) = (b, e)
                else:
                    N = get_graph_neighborhood_minus(b)
                    if graph_is_reachable(N, u, v):
                        e_prime = b
                    else:
                        LL[v].append((b_prime, e_prime, 0))
                        (b_prime, e_prime) = (b, b)
        if b_prime != None:
            assert (l == 0)
            LL[v].append((b_prime, e_prime, 0))
    if Caching:
        all_LL[u] = LL
    return LL



all_PL = {}
nb_all_PL = 0



[docs]def PrevListOldNoDist(u, w, b, e, LL):
    global nb_all_PL
    if (u, w, b, e) in all_PL:
        nb_all_PL += 1
        return all_PL[(u, w, b, e)]
    l = e - b
    assert is_sorted(LL)
    PL = []
    vol = (0, 0)
    i = len(LL) - 1
    while i >= 0:
        (b_prime, e_prime, l_prime) = LL[i]
        if b_prime < b:
            if l_prime < l or l_prime != e_prime - b_prime:
                break
            if l_prime == l:
                PL.append((b_prime, vol))
                vol = plusvol(vol, VSP((b_prime, u), (e_prime, w)))
        i -= 1
    if i >= 0:
        if l_prime == 0:
            PL.append((e_prime, vol))
        else:
            PL.append((b_prime, vol))
    else:
        PL.append((alpha, vol))
    if Caching:
        all_PL[(u, w, b, e)] = PL
    return PL




[docs]def PrevList(u, w, b, e, LL):
    global nb_all_PL
    if (u, w, b, e) in all_PL:
        nb_all_PL += 1
        return all_PL[(u, w, b, e)]
    l = e - b
    assert is_sorted(LL)
    PL = []
    vol = (0, 0)
    (d, _) = dist_and_dim((b, u), e)
    i = len(LL) - 1
    while i >= 0:
        (b_prime, e_prime, l_prime) = LL[i]
        if b_prime < b:
            if l_prime < l or l_prime != e_prime - b_prime:
                break
            if l_prime == l:
                (d_prime, _) = dist_and_dim((b_prime, u), e_prime)
                if d_prime[(e_prime, w)] < d[(e, w)]:
                    break
                elif d_prime[(e_prime, w)] == d[(e, w)]:
                    PL.append((b_prime, vol))
                    vol = plusvol(vol, VSP((b_prime, u), (e_prime, w)))
        i -= 1
    if i >= 0:
        if l_prime == 0:
            PL.append((e_prime, vol))
        else:
            PL.append((b_prime, vol))
    else:
        PL.append((alpha, vol))
    if Caching:
        all_PL[(u, w, b, e)] = PL
    return PL



all_NL = {}
nb_all_NL = 0



[docs]def NextListOldNoDist(u, w, b, e, LL):
    global nb_all_NL
    if (u, w, b, e) in all_NL:
        nb_all_NL += 1
        return all_NL[(u, w, b, e)]
    l = e - b
    assert is_sorted(LL)
    NL = []
    vol = (0, 0)
    (d, _) = dist_and_dim((b, u), e)
    i = 0
    while i < len(LL):
        (b_prime, e_prime, l_prime) = LL[i]
        if b_prime > b:
            if l_prime < l or l_prime != e_prime - b_prime:
                break
            if l_prime == l:
                NL.append((e_prime, vol))
                vol = plusvol(vol, VSP((b_prime, u), (e_prime, w)))
        i += 1
    if i != len(LL):
        if l_prime == 0:
            NL.append((b_prime, vol))
        else:
            NL.append((e_prime, vol))
    else:
        NL.append((omega, vol))
    if Caching:
        all_NL[(u, w, b, e)] = NL
    return NL




[docs]def NextList(u, w, b, e, LL):
    global nb_all_NL
    if (u, w, b, e) in all_NL:
        nb_all_NL += 1
        return all_NL[(u, w, b, e)]
    l = e - b
    assert is_sorted(LL)
    NL = []
    vol = (0, 0)
    (d, _) = dist_and_dim((b, u), e)
    i = 0
    while i < len(LL):
        (b_prime, e_prime, l_prime) = LL[i]
        if b_prime > b:
            if l_prime < l or l_prime != e_prime - b_prime:
                break
            if l_prime == l:
                (d_prime, _) = dist_and_dim((b_prime, u), e_prime)
                if d_prime[(e_prime, w)] < d[(e, w)]:
                    break
                elif d_prime[(e_prime, w)] == d[(e, w)]:
                    NL.append((e_prime, vol))
                    # TODO : Checker VSP pour adaptation SFP.
                    vol = plusvol(vol, VSP((b_prime, u), (e_prime, w)))
        i += 1
    if i != len(LL):
        if l_prime == 0:
            NL.append((b_prime, vol))
        else:
            NL.append((e_prime, vol))
    else:
        NL.append((omega, vol))
    if Caching:
        all_NL[(u, w, b, e)] = NL
    return NL



all_Contributions = {}
nb_all_Contributions = 0



[docs]def Contribution(u, w, e, LL):
    (t, v) = e
    global nb_all_Contributions
    if (u, w, (t, v)) in all_Contributions:
        nb_all_Contributions += 1
        return all_Contributions[(u, w, (t, v))]
    vol_v = (0., 0)
    (begin, end, latency) = (None, None, None)  # for assert
    for (b, e, l) in LL:
        if t >= b and t <= e:
            if l == 0 and e - b > 0:
                if Caching:
                    all_Contributions[(u, w, (t, v))] = 0.
                return 0.
            vol_v = VSP_tv((b, u), (e, w), (t, v))
            if vol_v != (0., 0):
                break
    if vol_v == (0., 0):
        if Caching:
            all_Contributions[(u, w, (t, v))] = 0.
        return 0.
    vol_be = VSP((b, u), (e, w))
    Prev = PrevList(u, w, b, e, LL)
    Next = NextList(u, w, b, e, LL)
    c = 0.
    b_l = b
    for (b_l_minus, vol_l) in Prev:
        e_r = e
        for (e_r_plus, vol_r) in Next:
            c += (b_l - b_l_minus) * (e_r_plus - e_r) * divvol(vol_v, plusvol(plusvol(vol_l, vol_r), vol_be))
            e_r = e_r_plus
        b_l = b_l_minus
    if Caching:
        all_Contributions[(u, w, (t, v))] = c
    return c




[docs]def Betweenness(e):
    (t, v) = e
    B = 0.
    for u in V:
        LL = Latency_lists(u)
        for w in V:
            B += Contribution(u, w, (t, v), LL[w])
    return B




[docs]def load_link_stream(path,label_to_node = None):
    V, E, eventtimes = set(), set(), set()
    alpha = omega = None
    nodes_to_label = {}
    label_to_id = defaultdict(lambda: len(label_to_id))
    with open(path, 'r') as ipt:
        for l in ipt:
            l = l.strip().split()
            if len(l) == 2:
                assert l[0] in ["alpha", "omega"]
                if l[0] == "alpha":
                    alpha = float(l[1])
                else:
                    omega = float(l[1])
            else:
                assert (len(l) == 4)
                [b, e, u_label, v_label] = l
                b = float(b)
                e = float(e)
                #
                if label_to_node:
                    u = label_to_node[u_label]
                    v = label_to_node[v_label]
                else:
                    u = label_to_id[u_label]
                    v = label_to_id[v_label]
                    nodes_to_label[u] = u_label
                    nodes_to_label[v] = v_label
                #
                V.add(u)
                V.add(v)
                E.add((b, e, u, v))
                E.add((b, e, v, u))
                eventtimes.add(b)
                eventtimes.add(e)
    assert alpha != None
    assert omega != None
    eventtimes = list(eventtimes)
    eventtimes.sort()
    return V, E, eventtimes, alpha, omega




[docs]def latencies_CM_ss(LS, n):

    if type(n) is list or type(n) is tuple:
        n = n[2]
    global V, E, eventtimes, alpha, omega,Caching
    Caching = True
    V, E, eventtimes,alpha,omega = LS
    latencies = {}
    Res = Latency_lists(n)
    if Res is not None:
        for u in Res:
            tmp = [p[2] for p in Res[u]]
            if tmp:
                latencies[u] = min(tmp)
        # print("Latencies :", latencies)  # {source : [(starting_time,arrival_time,latence)]}
        return latencies




[docs]def distances_CM_ss(LS, n):
    if type(n) is list or type(n) is tuple:
        n = n[2]
    global V, E, eventtimes, alpha, omega, Caching
    Caching = True
    V, E, eventtimes,alpha,omega = LS
    distances = {}
    Res = only_dist((alpha, n), omega)
    if Res is not None:
        for v in Res:
            u = v[1]
            if u in distances:
                distances[u] = min(distances[u], Res[v])
            else:
                distances[u] = Res[v]
        return distances

    # print("Distances :", distances)  # {noeud temp : distance}
